value:
select SSEGURO,
		PRIMA,
		PRIMA_TARIFA,
		DESCUENTO,
		COMISION,
		max_sid 
from
(select SSEGURO,
		PRIMA,
		PRIMA_TARIFA,
		DESCUENTO,
		COMISION,
		LKP_MAX_KEY.max_sid 
		from
(

SELECT  T1.SSEGURO ,
		cast(TPCM.PRIMA as NUMERIC(25,10)) as PRIMA,
        --CAST ((T3.PRIMA * T5.ITASA / T6.ITASA)AS NUMERIC(25,10)) AS PRIMA, --fleet CR-2
		CAST ((T3.PRIMA_TARIFA * T5.ITASA / T6.ITASA) AS NUMERIC(25,10)) AS PRIMA_TARIFA,
		CAST ((T3.DESCUENTO * T5.ITASA / T6.ITASA) AS NUMERIC(25,10)) AS DESCUENTO,
        CAST ((T7.PCOMISI/100) AS NUMERIC(25,10)) AS COMISION --table to be pulled to dev
          
FROM cdp_stg_dwh.base_lib T1
LEFT JOIN cdp_ods.sisaxis_seguros T2
ON T1.SSEGURO = T2.SSEGURO

----------------------added for fleet CR-2--------------------
LEFT JOIN 												
(                                                       
select policy_item_id, sum (gwp_amt) as PRIMA           
from cdp_dwh.fact_policy_prem_comm_summary_t            
group by policy_item_id                                
)TPCM                                                   
ON T1.SSEGURO = TPCM.policy_item_id                     
--------------------------------------------------------------

LEFT JOIN
     (SELECT SSEGURO, 
			 --SUM(IPRIANUSEG) AS PRIMA, --commented to change the logic of prima_neta in fleet_policies table (CR-2)
			 SUM(IPRITARSEG) AS PRIMA_TARIFA, 
			 SUM(IDTOCOM) AS DESCUENTO, 
			 MAX(FCAMBIO) AS FCAMBIO
     FROM cdp_ods.sisaxis_garanseg
     WHERE NMOVIMI = 1
     GROUP BY SSEGURO) T3
ON T1.SSEGURO = T3.SSEGURO
	
LEFT JOIN cdp_ods.sisaxis_eco_tipocambio T5 /* Trae tasa de cambio Moneda Original a Pesos */
ON T2.CMONSEG = T5.CMONORI /* UniÃ³n por Tipo Moneda */
AND date(T3.FCAMBIO) = date(T5.FCAMBIO) /*UniÃ³n por fecha de moneda */ ---removed datepart() function

LEFT JOIN cdp_ods.sisaxis_eco_tipocambio T6 /* TransformaciÃ³n a UF */
ON date(T5.FCAMBIO) = date(T6.FCAMBIO)

LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT SSEGURO, PCOMISI FROM cdp_ods.SISAXIS_COMISIONSEGU WHERE NMOVIMI = 1) T7 ON T1.SSEGURO = T7.SSEGURO  --Table to be pulled to dev
/*AND T3.NMOVIMI = T7.NMOVIMI*/
WHERE T6.CMONORI = 'CLF'
ORDER BY T1.SSEGURO
)src
left outer join 
(select 1 dummy,max(primas_lib_key) max_sid  from  cdp_stg_dwh.primas_lib) LKP_MAX_KEY
on LKP_MAX_KEY.dummy=1)
where SSEGURO is not null
